discharge_note:
Dear valued pet owner,

We are pleased to inform you that Sparky, your male Parson Russel Terrier, has completed his outpatient consultation on 19th March 2025 at 09:15. The reason for this visit was for an eyelid mass removal.

Sparky's weight was recorded as 8 kg. As he is a neutered male, please continue to follow the neutering advice provided by your veterinarian.

Please note that no procedures, medicines, or prescriptions were administered during this visit. However, we will be in touch with you shortly to discuss the next steps regarding Sparky's eyelid mass removal.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are always here to help.

Thank you for entrusting us with Sparky's care.

The Veterinary Team
